name: Riddle Rooms
description:
This is a short escape room-style puzzle game. There are a series of rooms that require exploration and experimentation to progress through. This game started as my first C++ project in Unreal Engine and was later updated. There will be more updates to this, if not a complete remake, but for now, is not a priority of mine.

* It has been brought to my attention that there is no way to quit the game besides force quiting. I suppose that's the kinda thing you forget about in a school project. I'll try to update it before too long *
